sentences.en: He displayed determination as well as powerful oratory.
sentences.cn: 他既展示了雄辩的演讲术又显示了决心。

sentences.en: Webster's summation was later deemed a masterpiece of oratory.
sentences.cn: 韦伯斯特的这次总结陈词后来被视为雄辩史上的经典之作。

sentences.en: Also this improves your oratory skills to a large extent and also makes a significant.
sentences.cn: 而且这还会大幅度地提高你的演讲能力、丰富你的词汇量。
